message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,000 is too low.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $10,500 is closer than before, I still believe the product's true value aligns more closely with my budget. Could we possibly meet at $10,000?
